{{c/core|std::bit_and&lt;void&gt;}} is a specialization of {{lc|std::bit_and}} with parameter and return type deduced.

{{member|{{small|std::bit_and&lt;void&gt;::}}operator()|2=
{{ddcl|1=
template&lt; class T, class U &gt;
constexpr auto operator()( T&amp;&amp; lhs, U&amp;&amp; rhs ) const
    -&gt; decltype(std::forward&lt;T&gt;(lhs) &amp; std::forward&lt;U&gt;(rhs));
}}

Returns the result of {{c|std::forward&lt;T&gt;(lhs) &amp; std::forward&lt;U&gt;(rhs)}}.
